slide.title: Changes in MySQL
slide.blurb: In PHP 5 the MySQL client library is no longer bundled because:

list.bullet: Most systems have the library installed
Multiple versions of libraries can cause problems (mod_auth_mysql)
libmysql changed license to GPL, which means we can not bundle it with PHP anymore.

slide.blurb: Install the MySQL client libraries and add %--with-mysql=[DIR]% to ./configure
